title: Word Frequency Counter
description:
Create a class with method countWords(String[] words) that:
- Takes an array of words
- Returns HashMap<String, Integer> where key=word, value=count
Example: ["apple", "banana", "apple"] → {"apple": 2, "banana": 1}
